Class Department

java.lang.Object
Department
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Department
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
An instantiable class which defines a department in a company. All validation is done in the file that creates the department. A Department can only have one manager but many Workers.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Department

      public Department​(java.lang.String departmentName, Manager departmentManager)
      Department 2 argument constructor. Calls the 2 parameters from the GUI file associated with creating the department By default a no argument constructor is used to add aa manager to the department which is later assigned properly
      Parameters:
      departmentName - This is the name of the department
      departmentManager - This is the manager object of the department

  • Method Details

    • getDepartmentName

      public java.lang.String getDepartmentName()
      Accessor to return the name of the department
      Returns:
      a string value specifying the name of the department

    • setDepartmentName

      public void setDepartmentName​(java.lang.String departmentName)
      Mutator method to set the name of the department
      Parameters:
      departmentName - the name of the department

    • getDepartmentManager

      public Manager getDepartmentManager()
      Accessor to return the details of the departments Manager
      Returns:
      a Manager object, the manager of the department Returns the Managers name,address,eircode and date of employment

    • setDepartmentManager

      public void setDepartmentManager​(Manager departmentManager)
      Mutator to set the manager of the department
      Parameters:
      departmentManager - a Manager Object, the manager of the department

    • getDepartmentWorkers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Employee> getDepartmentWorkers()
      Accessor to return the employees that work in this department
      Returns:
      an array of Employee containing all of the Workers in the department

    • addEmployee

      public void addEmployee​(Worker employee)
      Method to add an employee to the departmentWorkers array
      Parameters:
      employee - an employee that will be added to the department

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Method to get the state of the department object

      Returns:
